data.name: WarningTitle
data.value: Put these codes in a safe place.

data.name: WarningDescription
data.value: If you lose your device and don't have the recovery codes you will lose access to your account.

data.name: ResetAuthenticatorInfo
data.value: Generating new recovery codes does not change the keys used in authenticator apps. If you wish to change the key used in an authenticator app you should reset your authenticator keys.
